Advanced linear algebraÂ¶

This chapter describes all of the linear algebra operations which are not basic enough to fall within the BLAS (Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms) framework.

  • Norms
    • Norm
    • HermitianNorm
    • SymmetricNorm
  • Invariants
    • Determinant
    • Trace

    • Square root

    • Householder solve

    • Hermitian pseudoinverse
    • HPD inversion
    • Triangular inversion

    • Hermitian to tridiagonal
    • General to Hessenberg
    • General to bidiagonal
  • Eigensolvers and SVD
    • Hermitian eigensolver

    • Skew-Hermitian eigensolver
    • Hermitian generalized-definite eigensolvers
    • Unitary eigensolver
    • Normal eigensolver
    • General eigensolver
    • Hermitian SVD
    • General SVD
  • Utilities
    • Householder reflectors
    • Applying packed Householder transforms
    • Applying pivots
    • Reduction of Hermitian generalized-definite EVPs

    • Hermitian to tridiagonal
